fr.An email from info@zenyway.com was just: Un email de info@zenyway.com vient de vous être envoyé
fr.If you haven't received that email, plea: Si vous n'avez pas reçu cet email, vérifiez s'il n'est pas dans votre dossier "indésirables"
fr.To activate your ZenyPass Vault, please: Pour finaliser la création de votre compte, vous devez cliquer sur le lien fourni dans cet email

en.An email from info@zenyway.com was just: An email from info@zenyway.com was just sent to you
en.If you haven't received that email, plea: If you haven't received that email, please check your spam folder
en.To activate your ZenyPass Vault, please: To activate your ZenyPass Vault, please follow the link in that email
